data.content: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.content: Opportunity is missed for most because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.content: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow know what you want to become.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.content: Well done is better than well said
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.content: Whatever you do, always give 100%. Unless you’re donating blood
data.author: Unknown

data.content: My darkest times taught me to shine.
data.author: Rod Wave

data.content: It’s okay not to be okay.
data.author: Jessie J

data.content: You are your best thing.
data.author: Toni Morrison

data.content: You can't regret the life you didn't lead.
data.author: Junot Díaz, The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao

data.content: If you cannot find peace within yourself, you will never find it anywhere else.
data.author: Marvin Gaye

data.content: Remember: The rules, like streets, can only take you to known places.
data.author: Ocean Vuong

data.content: We know what we are, but not what we may be.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.content: I want to grow. I want to be better. You Grow. We all grow. We're made to grow. You either evolve or you disappear.
data.author: Tupac Shakur

data.content: None but ourselves can free our minds.
data.author: Bob Marley

data.content: By letting it go it all gets done. The world is won by those who let it go. But when you try and try. The world is beyond the winning.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.content: And yet not a dream, but a mighty reality- a glimpse of the higher life, the broader possibilities of humanity, which is granted to the man who, amid the rush and roar of living, pauses four short years to learn what living means
data.author: W.E.B. Du Bois

data.content: What you think you become. What you feel you attract. What you imagine you create.
data.author: Buddha

data.content: It’s already yours.
data.author: Universe

data.content: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
data.author: Henry David Thoream

data.content: We don’t have to be smarter than the rest. We have to be more disciplined than the rest.
data.author: Warren Buffet

data.content: Challenges make you discover things about yourself that you never really knew.
data.author: Cicely Tyson

data.content: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says ‘I’m possible!
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.content: You define your own life. Don’t let other people write your script.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.content: Spread love everywhere you go.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.content: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.content: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.content: We don’t have to be smarter than the rest. We have to be more disciplined than the rest.
data.author: Warren Buffet

data.content: Challenges make you discover things about yourself that you never really knew.
data.author: Cicely Tyson

data.content: Wake up determined, go to bed satisfied.
data.author: Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson

data.content: Nobody built like you, you design yourself.
data.author: Jay-Z

data.content: When you’ve seen beyond yourself, then you may find, peace of mind is waiting there.
data.author: George Harrison

data.content: We need to take risks. We need to go broke. We need to prove them wrong, simply by not giving up.
data.author: Awkwafina

data.content: Definitions belong to the definers, not the defined.
data.author: Toni Morrison
